origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CurrencyOptionAPI.analyze_data', 'description': 'This function analyzes currency option data based on the currency pair, specified time period, economic indicators, and real-time quotes.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'currencyPair', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The currency pair to analyze, e.g., EUR/USD.'}, {'name': 'timePeriod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for historical data, e.g., 1 year.'}, {'name': 'economicIndicators', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of economic indicators to consider.'}, {'name': 'realTimeQuotes', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include real-time quotes in the analysis.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisReport', 'description': 'A detailed report on the currency option investment opportunity.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CurrencyOptionAPI.analyze_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'currencyPair'是'EUR/USD', 'timePeriod'是'1 year', 'economicIndicators'是['GDP', 'InflationRate', 'InterestRates'], 'realTimeQuotes'是true.
